Cazelles et al. (2016)

library(biogeonet)

Here are the basic

Examples

To be included in the vignette.

Niche model

nicheModel(5, .2, 1)
#>            [,1]       [,2]       [,3]       [,4]      [,5]
#> [1,]  0.0000000  0.0000000  0.0000000  0.0000000 0.4208585
#> [2,]  0.0000000  0.0000000  0.8066295  0.9234146 0.6298724
#> [3,]  0.0000000 -0.7224640  0.0000000  0.3018272 0.8566183
#> [4,]  0.0000000 -0.6504217 -0.5352589 -0.4578146 0.1235422
#> [5,] -0.1249474 -0.4224857 -0.2377722 -0.6514681 0.0000000

Colonization

seqx <- seq(0,10,.01)
valy <- sapply(seqx, FUN = colonization, 1, 5, 2)
plot(seqx, valy, type="l", las = 1)

Extinction

seqx <- seq(-2, 2, .01)
valy <- sapply(seqx, FUN = extinction, 1e-5, 1e-3, 1e3, -10)
plot(seqx, log10(valy), type="l", las = 1)
